view:dql.name: CONTACTGROUP_SERVICES
view:dql.view:raw: SELECT DISTINCT s.service_object_id AS object_id FROM IcingaServices s INNER JOIN s.contactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}'

view:dql.name: CONTACTGROUP_HOSTS
view:dql.view:raw: SELECT DISTINCT h.host_object_id AS object_id FROM IcingaHosts h INNER JOIN h.contactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}'

view:dql.name: TARGET_CONTACTGROUPS
view:dql.view:raw:
SELECT DISTINCT cg.alias, cg.contactgroup_id, cg.contactgroup_object_id FROM IcingaContactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm
WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}'
